body.name: Eicaus 92’’ Tall Cell Phone Tripod Stand with 16.5’’ Flexible Gooseneck and Remote, Overhead Tripod with Adjustable 360°Ball Head & Phone Holder for iPhone 15 Pro Max/Plus/14/13/12/11, Android

features: Expand Your Creativity with Adjustable Height: Discover the world of photography with our iPhone tripod that extends from 16 to 92 inches, offering endless possibilities for indoor and outdoor shoots. Its 16.5-inch flexible gooseneck provides unparalleled positioning flexibility, making it an excellent choice for capturing both low-angle and high-angle shots with precision.

Unmatched Stability and Portability: Experience superior stability and durability with our selfie tripod, distinguished by its sturdy weighted base. The innovative flip-lock design allows you to fold it down to a compact 16 inches swiftly. This portability feature ensures convenient storage in your car trunk or backpack side pocket, making it your ideal travel companion for spontaneous photography adventures.

Seamless Compatibility for Every Device: With adjustable extension from 2.8 to 5.7 inches, our phone clip accommodates all iPhone and Android smartphones, even those housed in bulky cases. Its 1/4 interface caters to cameras, and the 1/4 ball head makes it adaptable for ring lights, webcams, and phones. Perfect for FaceTime calls, video recording, and offering reliable support to your devices.

Elevate Your Content with Enhanced Features: Our package includes an upgraded phone clip featuring a cold shoe mount, specially designed for attaching microphones and LED lights. Additionally, a wireless Bluetooth remote shutter is provided, boasting an impressive range of up to 30 feet. Compatible with a diverse array of smartphones, this remote shutter ensures seamless connectivity, empowering you to capture flawless shots and videos effortlessly.

1-Year Warranty & 24/7 Support: Your satisfaction is our top priority. We welcome your suggestions and feedback at any time. Rest assured, Eicaus products are backed by a hassle-free 1-year warranty, guaranteeing replacements and continuous support. Reach out to us 24/7, and let us enhance your photography experience with our reliable products and dedicated customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the flexibility
reviews.reviewText: The gooseneck feature on this tripod is by far my favorite aspect of it. A lot of tripods I've bought in the past are rigid and I have to finagle with the settings to get just the right angle. Now with the flexibility of this tripod stand, it's shaved a few minutes off of my initial setup, allowing me to get to my video recording faster. I also appreciate that this came with a remote, which is handy whenever I need to quickly pause or don't like how a certain section of the video came out. Lastly, the adjustability of this stand allows me to record either standing, sitting, or hunched over a table. This tripod stand solved a lot of problems I wasn't even aware that I had. Great product and very happy I bought.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and convenient
reviews.reviewText: It's pretty easy to set up since it only comes in three pieces. The tripod, the gooseneck, and the phone accessory. The tripod seems pretty stable. So far, the gooseneck stays where I put it with the phone in the attachment. It's lightweight and overall is really convenient

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Useful for recording videos
reviews.reviewText: Remote works well, tripod is sturdy and easy to use. Telescopes to almost 6 feet. Choice of landscape or portrait modes for phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile tool for taking selfie
reviews.reviewText: The product arrived well packaged. There is no dent or bent in any of the component. After assembling, it stands well and can hold majority of phone sizes. I have been looking for a gift because the previous holder is already broken. My family is also planning to use it for shooting tiktok videos. Great buy, will recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is very sturdy and super simple to set up. I would recommend it to anyone who has the need for it. It goes way higher than I was expecting and the remote is super cool

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best of its kind
reviews.reviewText: I love this thing. I researched a lot of different models and am so glad I chose this one. It's one of the lightest and packs down smallest but has the highest reach, and the flexible top attachment is so great. I use it for filming but also to hold my phone while I watch shows on the couch, and in either case I can get it exactly where I want it to stay. It has been about a month of use now and I'm very pleased with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Absolute Game-Changer for Capturing Moments!
reviews.reviewText: This cell phone tripod stand is an absolute game-changer for anyone looking to up their content creation or video call game. Standing tall with a flexible 16.5’’ gooseneck, it provided amazing versatility in positioning my phone exactly where I needed it. The flexibility of the gooseneck is the standout feature for me, it really does allow me to achieve those tricky angles effortlessly.Setting it up is a breeze, and it accommodates various phone sizes snugly. Whether I'm shooting a time-lapse, participating in a Zoom call, or just enjoying a hands-free video binge, this tripod stand has become an indispensable tool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am a photographer for pleasure not work, and I wanted something to take better pictures with but not spend a ton of money. This cell phone tripod is exactly what I was looking for!It's sturdy and you can tell it's quality made so it should last me quite some time.I like how I can adjust my phone in any way possible to get the perfect angle for the perfect shot!Plus it has a firm hold on my phone so I don't have to worry about it slipping off and breakingI definitely recommend this to anyone who wants to take great pictures with fun angles and not worry about dropping your cell phone while doing it!
